column4: i was pretty sure i had registered my nicname but freenode is saying please register my nicname, is that jsut something it says to everyone?
thats the thing i didnt need to enter my password when i logged in, perhaps i failed to register correctly?

maybe. you can do /nickserv register password email to register your nickname again. if it is already registered, then you cant, or it will register. it sends an email, before the nick is registered tho8gh
